title.rendered: Five Questions to Ask Yourself if You’re on the Fence About Lash Extensions

content.rendered:
Sometimes, change can be difficult. Of course, some changes are more difficult than others. That’s especially true for women who are thinking about making major changes to their beauty regimen – which is why so many women stick to the same products and styles year after year. Take eyelash extensions, for example. If you’ve been thinking about trying them for your lashes, you may find yourself unsure about whether they’re the right choice for you. Here are five questions to ask yourself if you’re on the fence about getting lash extensions.

How healthy are your natural lashes?

First, you need to assess your lash health. Are your lashes healthy and relatively strong, or do they break off regularly? Weak lashes may not be able to handle some extensions, as they won’t have the strength to support even that modest extra weight. If they’re healthy, however, your natural lashes should be up for the challenge!

Are you tired of your short, straight lashes?

We all want long, perfectly-curled eyelashes – but so few of us have them. Are you sick of lashes that are short, limp, and uninspired? Are you eager for a new lash look that adds a bit of drama and excitement to your life? If so, you’re not alone. Set aside the mascara and lash curler and give extensions a try.

Are you prepared to take care of extensions?

Wearing lash extensions is not entirely duty-free, of course. To get the most out of them, you need to take care of them. That means daily brushing, cleansing, and a tireless commitment to not tug or pull at them. Obviously, you don’t consciously try to smear your mascara, right? Well, be prepared to give your extensions that same level of respect and care.

Are you interested in minimizing your makeup routine?

Speaking of mascara, are you ready to stop wearing it altogether? How about your other eye makeup? Wouldn’t it be nice to have lashes that were ready to go whenever you are? With lash extensions, you can finally enjoy that freedom and cut down on your makeup requirements. In fact, your new look may cause you to realize that you can go without makeup entirely!

Don’t you deserve to enjoy perfect lashes?

Here’s the most important question: what do you deserve? Do you deserve to look and feel your best? Would perfect lashes help you achieve that goal? Do you serve to enjoy the confidence that comes from knowing that your eyes are properly showcased for the entire world? Don’t be afraid to answer in the affirmative. You know you deserve all of that and more.

The answers to these questions can help you to finally make up your mind about eyelash extensions. If your lashes are healthy and you’re tired of the same old routine, then lash extensions can be the perfect way to give your eyelashes a new lease on life and finally enjoy that perfect lash look that you deserve.
